BBK01.WU5014: Exchange rates on the Frankfurt exchange / JPY 100 = DM ... / Japan

General: Average calculated from daily quotations. From 1 December 1969 to 30 December 1998 official quotation on the Frankfurt exchange. From January 1999, euro reference exchange rates of the European Central Bank; see wu5630.
Comment on 1971-10: Quotation suspended from 7 September 1971 to 5 January 1972.
